name: Rockaway Beach Skatepark
description: Beachside bowl-heavy park with deep transition. One of the gnarliest parks in NYC.
history: Community-driven build on the Rockaway boardwalk. Attracts serious transition skaters.
bestTimes: Summer mornings — combine with a beach day. Off-season weekdays are empty.
transitDirections: A to Rockaway Beach stations, or ferry to Rockaway.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, snake run, pool coping, deep end, extensions. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Queens skate scene in Rockaway Beach. Community-driven build on the Rockaway boardwalk. Attracts serious transition skaters.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: A to Rockaway Beach stations, or ferry to Rockaway.. Summer mornings — combine with a beach day. Off-season weekdays are empty.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
